weekend_delivery.days: Tijekom vikenda i praznika narudžbe ne šaljemo!

locations: OPTIKA Adrialece.hr ZAGREB, Zagrebačka avenija 104, 10 000 Zagreb
OPTIKA Adrialece.hr SPLIT, Ulica Ljudevita Posavskog 17, 21 000 Split

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker pickup, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Hrvatska pošta, Overseas Express, and Box Now.
PRICING: Home delivery starts at 3.49€, parcel locker delivery at 2.99€, and in-store pickup costs 0.99€. Free shipping is available for all orders over 55€. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 0.90€ applies to all applicable orders.
RESTRICTIONS: Orders are not shipped on weekends or holidays. There is no information regarding extra charges or restrictions for delivery to Croatian islands.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Customers can pick up their orders at physical store locations in Zagreb and Split, which are open on Saturdays. The website mentions 'priority processing' but does not define it as a formal express delivery option with distinct pricing or timelines.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is well-organized and clearly presented on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. The table format makes it easy to compare costs and payment methods for different delivery options. The inclusion of store addresses and opening hours is a significant plus. The only notable omission is information about island deliveries.
